def_en: If a physical object is mangled, it is crushed or twisted very forcefully, so that it is difficult to see what its original shape was.

def_cn: （因发音、书写错误或表达不清晰而）扭曲，改变（词语、信息的意思）
def_en: If you say that someone mangles words or information, you are criticizing them for not speaking or writing clearly or correctly.

def_cn: (旧时由两个木制滚筒辗压衣服的）轧干机，脱水机
def_en: A mangle is an old-fashioned machine for removing water from clothes that have been washed. The clothes are squeezed between two wooden cylinders.
